name: Foundation
tagline: Foundation is a Sponge plugin which provides core functionality to the server. It also provides an API for other plugins.
body:
# Welcome to Foundation.
This is a Sponge plugin, licensed under the MIT licence, and is heavily in development.
```
This website is under construction.
```
Help us develop. Open a PR.
